title: Inflationary expectations - nom IR - bond prices

content.question: An increase in inflationary expectations will most likely affect nominal interest rates and bond prices in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label: Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase No change
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Decrease
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices No change Increase
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Decrease Increase
Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Decrease Decrease

content.answer: Nominal Interest Rates Bond Prices Increase Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
